Summary: Saw a clip on Youtube. During an interview the object appeared behind person being interviewed. Don't know if it is a glitch, but can send clip to get your opinion.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching a Youtube clip titled "The tense debate between Rep Gohmert and a fox news anchor you don't want to miss".At 1:10 I noticed a disc-shaped object moving diagnally up and from right to left toward and over the Capital Building, leaving a trail behind it.I don't know if this was a video glitch, or if they were even showing a live shot in the background as they sometimes do, but hoping you guys can tell me more. I have seen footage exactly like this on Youtube before, but still don't know if they are legitimate sightings either. Please let me know what your opinion is if you have time to view the clip. It starts at 1:10, and lasts about 5-6 seconds. Thanks for your time. PS: Can send the clip if you have a hard time finding it.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Washington
There were no other sightings in Washington on or around October 18th 2013
